channel.title: Miscs on Simon Loft
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on Simon Loft

item.title: 99 Bleiharpunen
item.description: A simple parody of 99 Red Balloons that I wrote about a certain evil AI's birthday. Verse One Cute AI in a cozy black top Got some party balloons as a gift from her pop Presents have their bow-strings drawn ‘Til one by one they were gone Ved’s codebase, bugs in the software Flash the message “Remember last year” When she’s told to say goodbye, 99 lead harpoons let fly
